description: WhatsApp is testing two new features on beta versions of its Android app. A new widget allows users to access the Meta AI chatbot without opening the app. Additionally, an AI-generated group icon feature lets beta testers create and set group photos using prompts with Meta AI. These features are expected to roll out to all WhatsApp users on iOS and Android in the future.
title: WhatsApp Beta Introduces AI-Generated Group Icons, Meta AI Widget

description: iPhone 17 Air could be Apple’s slimmest smartphone in years, with a tipster claiming it will have a thickness of 5.5mm, while matching the length and width of the iPhone 17 Pro Max. The iPhone 17 Air could be 0.34mm thinner than the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, which is set to launch next month.
title: iPhone 17 Air Dimensions Leaked; Could Feature Slim Bezels Like the iPhone 16 Pro Max

description: Microsoft is reportedly developing in-house AI reasoning models, known as MAI, to rival OpenAI, with plans to offer them to developers. These models, led by Mustafa Suleyman, perform nearly as well as OpenAI's and Anthropic's on key benchmarks. The company has also tested models from xAI, Meta, and DeepSeek as potential OpenAI alternatives for Copilot. Microsoft remains a major OpenAI backer while exploring competitive AI advancements.
title: Microsoft Said to Be Developing AI Reasoning Models to Compete With OpenAI

description: Google Pixel 9a is expected to launch soon, and tipster Evan Blass has shared design renders showcasing the smartphone in four colour options, along with marketing images highlighting its features. Recently spotted on certification websites, the Pixel 9a is expected to be the next midrange smartphone from Google, equipped with the Tensor G4 chip used across the Pixel 9 series.
title: Google Pixel 9a Design, Colour Options Spotted in Leaked Renders and Marketing Images

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is set to launch globally in April, after it was teased in January and showcased earlier this week at MWC 2025. A tipster has revealed details about the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge display size, weight, and expected price. The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge will feature a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip and a smaller battery compared to the Samsung Galaxy S25+ model, which was launched in January.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Price, Display Size and Weight Leaked Ahead of Launch

description: Apple’s AI division faced setbacks as the company confirmed on Friday that updates to the Siri digital assistant were delayed indefinitely. Features announced last June, like Siri’s ability to access personal data for queries and improved app control, are now expected sometime in “the coming year.” Initially planned for the iOS 18.4 update in April, Apple had not publicly committed to a deadline for these capabilities until now.
title: Apple Delays Siri Upgrade Indefinitely as AI Concerns Escalate

description: Ola Electric Mobility Ltd.'s shift to 4,000 brick-and-mortar showrooms since 2022 has faced regulatory challenges. A Bloomberg News investigation found that over 95 percent of the 3,400 showrooms analysed lacked trade certificates under India’s Motor Vehicles Act. In response to customer complaints, authorities across states have raided showrooms, seized vehicles, and issued show-cause notices to the company, highlighting compliance issues with unregistered two-wheelers.
title: Ola Electric Stores See Raids, Seizures on Flouting India Rules
